Dgame.Graphic.Color



struct Color4b;
Color4b defines a structure which contains 4 ubyte values, each for red, green, blue and alpha.

Author:
Randy Schuett

static immutable Color4b Black;
Black Color (0, 0, 0)

static immutable Color4b White;
White Color (255, 255, 255)

static immutable Color4b Red;
Red Color (255, 0, 0)

static immutable Color4b Green;
Green Color (0, 255, 0)

static immutable Color4b Blue;
Blue Color (0, 0, 255)

static immutable Color4b Cyan;
Cyan Color (0, 255, 255)

static immutable Color4b Yellow;
Yellow Color (255, 255, 0)

static immutable Color4b Magenta;
Magenta Color (255, 0, 255)

static immutable Color4b Gray;
Gray Color (179, 179, 179)

ubyte red;
The color components

ubyte green;
The color components

ubyte blue;
The color components

ubyte alpha;
The color components

pure nothrow @nogc this(ubyte red, ubyte green, ubyte blue, ubyte alpha = 255);
CTor

pure nothrow @nogc this()(auto ref const Color4f col);
CTor Expect that every component is in range 0.0 .. 1.0

const pure nothrow @nogc Color4b withTransparency(ubyte alpha);
Returns a copy of the current Color with a given transpareny.

const pure nothrow @nogc bool opEquals(ref const Color4b col);
opEquals:
compares two Colors.

const pure nothrow @nogc ubyte[4] asRGBA();
Returns the RGBA color information as static array

const pure nothrow @nogc ubyte[3] asRGB();
Returns RGB the color information as static array

struct Color4f;
Color4f defines a structure which contains 4 floats values, each for red, green, blue and alpha.

Author:
Randy Schuett

static immutable Color4f Black;
Black Color (0, 0, 0)

static immutable Color4f White;
White Color (255, 255, 255)

static immutable Color4f Red;
Red Color (255, 0, 0)

static immutable Color4f Green;
Green Color (0, 255, 0)

static immutable Color4f Blue;
Blue Color (0, 0, 255)

static immutable Color4f Cyan;
Cyan Color (0, 255, 255)

static immutable Color4f Yellow;
Yellow Color (255, 255, 0)

static immutable Color4f Magenta;
Magenta Color (255, 0, 255)

static immutable Color4f Gray;
Gray Color (179, 179, 179)

CTor

pure nothrow @nogc this(float red, float green, float blue, float alpha = 1);
CTor Expect that every component is in range 0.0 .. 1.0

CTor
